com.connectfour.viewactions

Class Artist

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.connectfour.viewactions.Artist

  • public class Artist
extends java.lang.Object
    This class manages the creation of our display and facilitates the drawing of all our drawable objects. Also serves as the entry point for retrieving Textures from our resources file.

        x - (required) the x position of the object
        y - (required) the y position of the object

        height - (required) the height of the object
